diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AC$ is $10$ units.
The length of the line $AD$ is $x$ units.
The length of the line $CD$ is $4$ units.
The length of the line $BD$ is $y$ units.
Point $D$ lies on the line connecting $B$ and $C$.
The lines $AD$ and $BD$ are also perpendicular.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, $AD$, forming a right triangle $ABD$.
There are lines $BC$, $BD$, $CD$, forming a right triangle $BCD$.
